alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 1:40AM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches between 5000 and 8000 feet, 10 to 18 inches above 8000 feet, and up to 30 inches at the crest. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on Highway 168 west of Bishop. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
